jobs_results.title: Sr Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
For one of our client, a bank in Geneva, we are hiring a Sr Android Developer

Responsabilities:

As a Sr Android Developer you develop user interface using android environment. Moreover, you maintain hight standards of Software development and quality code delivery. Besides, you ensure high performance of applications and you provide support. In addition, you review code, mentor and coach. You also conduct performance tests, you integrate and you collaborate with an offshore team. You identify capability gap and assist the team in filling them

Profile:
• Bachelor in IT or equivalent
• Minimum 5 years experience in a similar role
• Experience in DI frameworks
• Experience in REST API's
• Excellent knowledge in Kotlin
• Excellent knowledge in Android architecture components
• Strong knowlege in RxJava and multithreading
• Knowledge in NBK, C++
• Knowledge in Unit / UI tests
• Knowledge in Agile
• Knowledge in MVM / MVP
• French and English

#LI-GS1 #Boost #LI-Hybrid

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an end client based in geneva an Android Developer with expertise in Kotlin and modern Android development practices.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining Android applications, ensuring high performance and responsiveness. If you thrive in a collaborative environment and have a passion for building scalable, high-quality mobile applications

Key Responsibilities

• Develop, test, and maintain Android applications using Kotlin and Android SDK.

• Design and implement robust, scalable, and maintainable architecture patterns like MVVM or MVP.

• Build responsive, high-performing, and user-friendly apps utilizing frameworks such as ROOM, Dagger, and RxJava.

• Write clean, maintainable, and testable code, with a strong focus on unit testing using JUnit.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams (backend, UI/UX, and product) to define and ship new features.

• Integrate RESTful APIs for efficient communication between the application and the backend services.

• Optimize applications for maximum speed, scalability, and user engagement.

• Work with tools and technologies for multithreading and asynchronous programming to ensure smooth app functionality.

• Debug and resolve production issues while ensuring code quality through code reviews.

Ideal candidate:

• Proven experience in Android development with Kotlin.

• Proficiency in modern Android development technologies such as:

• MVVM/MVP architectural patterns.

• Dependency injection frameworks like Dagger.

• Database tools like ROOM.

• Reactive programming with RxJava.

• Unit testing with JUnit.

• Strong understanding of multithreading and concurrency management.

• Experience working with RESTful APIs and integrating them into mobile applications.

• Solid grasp of mobile development best practices, performance optimization, and security.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer
jobs_results.description: At SwissBorg, our mission is to democratize financial assets, allowing ordinary people the ability to achieve financial freedom. SwissBorg is Europe’s fastest-growing Crypto app and since launching in 2020 in Lausanne, Switzerland our innovative app has taken the market by storm! We currently offer 54 cryptocurrencies, operate in 100+ countries, and have a community base of 650,000+ users. The crypto revolution is reshaping the financial landscape, offering transparency and financial opportunities previously limited to the wealthy. Our mission is to create a user-friendly and community-centric product that opens doors for everyone. At Swissborg, we aim to provide accessible tools that empower individuals to safely grow their wealth using the potential of DeFi. What you might be doing: Contribute to the development and evolution of our Android apps Work closely with the Product, Apple/iOS and Backend teams Write clear and maintainable code with Unit/UI tests Evaluate the right technologies and keep yourself up to date to the Android technology landscape Constantly improve the quality of our products by fixing bugs and refactoring the code base where necessary Implement best practices to ensure app reliability and security What you might bring: 3 + years of experience developing Android native apps Knowledge of Kotlin Knowledge of Jetpack Compose and Kotlin Coroutines is a plus Knowledge of dependency injection frameworks (Dagger, Koin) Knowledge ofMVI is a plus Solid understanding of the full mobile development lifecycle Strong UX/UI design skills and the care to develop world-class user interfaces Experience with encryption, cryptography standards and securing Android app is a plus What you can expect from us: We offer a remote working environment 25 days annual leave plus local bank holidays Annual bonus paid in BORG A welcome BORG bonus Flexible working hours Individual learning and development budget Annual team retreats A MacBook Pro An equipment voucher to ensure that your home office is up to your standards Menstrual leave At SwissBorg, we embrace diversity. We strongly believe that getting the best outcome requires different perspectives and backgrounds. We’re committed to openness, curiosity and creating an inclusive culture because we know that diverse teams build better products and generate better ideas. We strongly encourage applications from everyone!To ensure a safe andamp; welcoming space, please feel free to let us know of anything you require to feel comfortable bringing your whole self to the recruitment process. Keep an eye on our Careers Page and follow us on LinkedIn andamp; Twitter for regular company updates! Apply for this job

jobs_results.title: Front End Mobile & Web Developer - React & IOS Or Android (English)
jobs_results.description:
Front End Mobile & Web Developer - React & iOS or Android (English)

Basel, Switzerland

CHF 120,000 – CHF 130,000

Encouraged to design and develop your applications creatively

Are you front end developer looking for more ownership over your work, and the freedom to design and develop more creatively? We are working with a private bank in Basel looking for a Front End Developer to join the mobile and web application team.

We are happy to consider EU citizens who are not currently living in Switzerland if you are interested in relocating.

Your challenge

You’ll work in a small team, where you will be given independence and ownership over your work. Create and design features and improvements for client-facing mobile and web applications. Whilst working in a flat hierarchical company that values your technical skills, in a team of complementary skillsets.
• You’ll design and develop the bank’s client-facing mobile and web applications using ReactJS/ Native, along with some iOS and Android development.
• Analyse new features for the client-facing mobile and web applications.
• Support front end integration with back end services
• Extend the CI/CD build pipelines

About you

A front end developer with circa 5 years’ experience in mobile and web application.

React and iOS or Android experience

What next

For an informal chat, please call me on +44 20 3763 9533. Don’t worry if your CV isn’t up to date. Just send me what you have and we can deal with that later.

jobs_results.title: Android Senior Developer (Internal Position)
jobs_results.description:
Type de contrat: CDI

Lieu de travail: Genève

Télétravail (2j max/semaine): Non

Chez BS-Team, nous avons à cœur d’accompagner nos collaborateurs tout au long de leur carrière en leur offrant des opportunités d’évolution. Nous sommes convaincus que l’élargissement des connaissances et des compétences est primordial pour leur réussite professionnelle et leur épanouissement au quotidien.

Mission:

In order to strengthen our client’s development team we are looking for Android expertise

Your role:
• Develop user interface using Android Native Dev environment
• Maintain high standards of software development and quality code delivery Ensure high performance of application and provide support
• Review code, mentor and coach
• Conduct performance tests
• Integrate and collaborate with an offshore team of developers
• Guide team development efforts towards successful project delivery, balancing business and team priorities
• Identify capability gaps and assist the team in filling them

Your profil:
• Higher education diploma in computer science (ES) or Master IT or HES diploma.
• Minimum 6 years of experience on Android application development projects
• Fluent French and English
• Excellent Kotlin knowledge
• Strong knowledge of RxJava, multithreading
• Excellent knowledge of Android architecture components
• Experience with any of the existing Dl frameworks
• Knowledge of standard libraries such as Retofit, Glide, etc.

Would be a plus if:
• Multi module apps or libraries development
• Creating complex custom views
• Experience with REST APIs Multi module apps or libraries development NDK and C++
• Unit / LJI tests

Technical skills :

Current technologies, architecture and fibs:
• MVM / MVP
• Room
• Dagger
• RXJava
• Junit

Understanding & Tools:
• Git & Gitlab as versioning tools
• Bitrise / Firebase
• RestfulApi & JsonAPl
• Agile methodologies

Date of entry :
• ASAP

The + :
• Internal position in our client

Nous ne répondrons qu’aux candidatures qui correspondront le mieux aux prérequis.
Votre dossier ne sera pas transmis à d’autres entreprises.

jobs_results.title: Projekt – Mobile Developer Android
jobs_results.description:
Projekt – Mobile Developer Android
• Auslastung: 80%
• Start: 1.1.2025
• Ende: 31.12.2025, Option auf Verlängerung
• Ort:

Zürich

, Remote & 2 – 3 Tage pro Woche vor Ort
• Kundensegment: Media
• Bewerbung von ausserhalb CH:

Der Kandidat muss einen EU Pass besitzen, Schengen Staat, kann auch Zweitnationalität sein, (Nationalität ausserhalb Schengen Raum mit Arbeitserlaubnis DE, AT usw.… geht nicht)
• Payrolling

:

Der Kandidat muss zwingend vom Payroller des Kunden abgerechnet werden

. Bewerbungen von Agenturen und Firmen können leider nicht berücksichtig werden. Es sei denn, der Kandidat einer Agentur oder der Mitarbeiter einer Firma vergütet die Marge von seinem Lohn (den er von Payroller erhält) an die Agentur oder die Firma.
• Offerte bis spätestens Donnerstagabend oder Freitagmorgen vorliegend

Aufgabe:
• Entwickeln und betreiben der Mobile Apps für die Plattform Android
• Teilnahme an sämtlichen Scrum-Meetings

Anforderungen/Skills:
• Höhere Ausbildung (ETH / Uni / FH) in Informatik/Wirtschaft oder vergleichbare Ausbildung
• Umfassende Erfahrung in der Entwicklung von

Android Apps mit Kotlin

, tiefes Verständnis der Best Practices in der Android Entwicklung sowie fundierte Kenntnisse moderner Programmierparadigmen.
• Hands-on Skills mit

Jetpack Compose und Kotlin Coroutines/Flows
• Geübt im Managen und Verbessern des

CI/CD Prozess

sowie in den entsprechenden Buildtools und Prozessen dieses Bereiches
• Interesse an den neusten technologischen mobilen Entwicklungen und Trends (insbesondere im Android und erweiterten Web-Umfeld

: iOS

)
• Vertieftes Grundverständnis von auftretenden Problemen, Lösungsorientierung und Begeisterung für agile Vorgehensweisen, insbesondere Scrum
• Offene, aufgeschlossene und neugierige Haltung als Teamplayer:in
• Fliessendes und verhandlungssicheres Deutsch sowie Englisch (schriftlich/mündlich)
• die Must Items sind: Android Apps mit Kotlin

,

Jetpack Compose und Kotlin Coroutines/Flows

,

iOS

-> Erfahrung und Know-how muss im CV ersichtlich sein.

Bei Interesse senden Sie mir bitte Ihren CV in Word an

roger.schibli@arobis.ch

jobs_results.title: Android Mobile Application Developer / Entwickler
jobs_results.description:
Pour l'un de nos clients, une banque Genevoise nous recrutons un Android Mobile Application Developer

Responsabilités :
En tant qu'Android Mobile Application Developer vous intégrez une équipe de développeur IT. Vous reprenez les développements existants et réalisez de nouveaux projets. dédiés à des projets dans un environnement complexe. Vous suivez les bonnes pratiques de développement et de sécurité. Vous mettez en oeuvre les recommandations des TechLeads.

Profil :
• Diplôme ingénieur HES en IT ou équivalent
• Au moins 5 ans d'expérience dans un poste similaire
• Excellentes connaissances Java et Kotlin, SDK Android
• Excellentes connaissances Eco-System Google
• Très bonnes connaissances Architecture des Applications Mobiles
• Bonnes connaissances API (système messagerie et notifications push)
• Orienté objet et fonctionnel
• Connaissances GiT
• Connaissances integration API REST
• Connaissances React Native
• Français courant et anglais bon niveau

jobs_results.title: Mobile Software Engineer​/Android​/C+
jobs_results.description:
Position: Mobile Software Engineer (Android / C+

Mobile Software Engineer (Android) - Zurich

A dynamic and innovative cyber security company that specializes in high-end security solutions for the digital age is looking for an experienced Mobile Software Engineer (Android) to join their growing team!

The company is going from strength to strength and has grown to over 60 passionate professionals who focus their days on making cyberspace safer and more secure.
With a wealth of expertise in cryptography, secure systems engineering, and IoT security, they are at the forefront of ensuring a safer digital environment.

Day to day role / expectations:
• Collaboration in the development of a secure smartphone and the corresponding development infrastructure.
• Agile teamwork with an experienced and motivated group of professionals in a growing organization.
• Application of best practices in software development, utilizing modern development infrastructure.
• Continuous development of a robust CI/CD toolchain.
• Cross-functional collaboration with recognized specialists from various fields.

Ideal experience / background:
• A completed degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a similar field, ideally with additional knowledge in Information Security.
• Experience as a mobile software engineer, with a focus on developing secure solutions.
• In-depth knowledge of Linux, Android, and mobile hardware.
• Solid experience with C, C++, Java, Kotlin, and associated development tools.
• Strong motivation to contribute to the creation of a secure smartphone solution.
• Proficiency in German (native speaker) and English (spoken and written).

Further info / Further benefits:
• Challenging and exciting tasks in the growing cyber security industry.
• A comprehensive onboarding program to familiarize you with your role and responsibilities.
• A corporate culture that values short decision-making processes and flat hierarchies.
• Generous support for continued education and professional development.
• A modern, centrally located office with excellent transport connections.

To apply for this Mobile Software Engineer role, please send over your CV or call Ric Marshall at Oliver James for more information.
#J-18808-Ljbffr
